settings.heading:
Customize Your Sleep
Products with Us

You’re in the Right
Company to Innovate
settings.text: At South Bay International, the sky is the limit when it comes to creating a more restful, rejuvenating night’s sleep. With our team of researchers and designers, you’re in the right company to innovate the sleeping solutions of your dreams.
We create cutting-edge, technology-supported products and reserve award-winning patents to keep up with industry trends
From raw materials to the finished product, we take ownership in every step of the manufacturing process for the highest quality control
We have one of the world’s largest mattress and adjustable base factories with 755,000+ square feet of warehouse space
As your domestic mattress and vertically integrated adjustable base manufacturing partner, we offer nationwide B2B, B2C and DTC dropship capabilities
Customer convenience is a priority, which is why we offer white glove delivery and in-home setup options and quick delivery via Fed-Ex or UPS
Our customers are our number one priority. We prioritize relationships through nationwide customer service and end-user support

settings.heading: Let’s Get Dreaming
settings.text: Creating a better sleep product begins here! Fill out our form to get started
settings.checkbox_text: Opt in for South Bay International’s newsletter.
